channel.title: Help on new server
channel.description: I have started my first server :D but everytime i run it, it just goes to 0.0.0.0 and no1 else can go on.. How do i make it be on my ip adress and other people can get on :confused:

item.title: Help on new server
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Smokeychig:

i did that, it just says no need to update plz reply[br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 07:30:44 PM[/size][hr]plz reply i need so much help right now…[br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 07:39:57 PM[/size][hr]omg plz i need help no1 helping me :((

please do not “dump” you make multiple posts. this is all spam the next time you wish to modify a message just click the modify button at the top right of your post.

Read full topic

item.title: Help on new server
item.dc:creator: @us_sniper04 us sniper04
item.description:
@us_sniper04 wrote:

ok you can also make a hamachi server

first you go to www.hamachi.cc/ and download hamachi.

next you make ur account and all.

then you go to the 2nd button to the right(the one with the 3 little circles)

click on that and click creat a network.

now you will put in a name and a password so peopl can log into your networks.

for example.

one of my networks is arrowscape1 and the password is 123

i recommend using 123 as your password since its easy.

you will want to make about 5-10 to start out with.

then you will see a be number at the top of hamachi.

for example mine is 5.122.199.10.

that is your ip. use that as your ip for people to log onto your server

good luck

Read full topic

item.title: Help on new server
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

That’s good, that’s what it should say. “DNS is current: no update needed” right? And the smiley should be blushing and smiling. Also, did you go to your firewall, disable it, and put your port in the
‘Exceptions’ tab to allow it through?

Read full topic

item.title: Help on new server
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

Update your No-ip through DUC No-IP, and make sure your server port # is available to take connections.

Read full topic
